page.title: 02CLUBS (1)
page.content: THE NUMEROUS CLUBS OF SOMERSHAM CATER FOR A WIDE VARIETY OF AGES AND INTERESTS. FOR THE ADULTS THERE IS THE WORKING MAN'S CLUB CALLED THE PALACE SOCIAL CLUB, TWO BOWLS CLUBS, A CRICKET CLUB, A BINGO CLUB, WOMEN'S INSTITUTE, MOTHERS' UNION, THE NATIONAL HOUSEWIFE REGISTER, NETBALL AND BADMINTON CLUBS AND THE OVER SIXTIES CLUB. THERE ARE 2 MOTHERS AND TODDLERS GROUPS. THE FOOTBALL CLUB IS FOR ALL AGES AND OPENS ON WEDNESDAYS, FRIDAYS, SATURDAYS AND SUNDAYS. A BAR IS AVAILABLE, POOL CAN BE PLAYED AND ON WEDNESDAYS DARTS MATCHES ARE ORGANISED. FOR THE CHILDREN THERE ARE THE BROWNIES, GUIDES, CUBS, SCOUTS, KARATE CLUB, A RIDING SCHOOL, DANCING SCHOOL AND THE YOUTH CLUB.
